verses.name: Luke 24:16
verses.text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him.

verses.name: Luke 24:17
verses.text: And he said unto them, What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another, as ye walk, and are sad?

verses.name: Luke 24:18
verses.text: And the one of them, whose name was Cleopas, answering said unto him, Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem, and hast not known the things which are come to pass there in these days?

verses.name: Luke 24:19
verses.text: And he said unto them, What things? And they said unto him, Concerning Jesus of Nazareth, which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people:
